Uh, aren't you jumpin' the gun a bit here? I mean, geez, at least buy me dinner or somethin' first.
I appreciate gettin' straight to the point, but... Aren't you skippin' a few steps here? I don't even know you yet!
You've got a good eye, Homegirl! Simple 'n fuctional is more my style, you know?
You've got that right! I prefer comfort over looks, Homegirl.
No kiddin'? That's awesome! I love the sound of shreddin' guitars!
Yo...! I haven't heard some good ol' rock since DCMC broke up... Maybe Franchouchou can scratch that itch!
Yeah, you seem more like the princess type. You've got the stick planted firmly up your ass 'n everything!
Oh, pardon me, m'lady. I was too busy fightin' monsters and being in constant danger to attend "Stuck Up Prissy Snob Princess" school.

condition.saying: I don't think I've ever seen a more snug wizardy robe than that, Miss Kuma!

case.state: Heh! Thanks, ~trixie~. Maybe bein' a "princess" who barely owns more than the clothes on her back has got somethin' to do with teachin' me humility.
That's real nice of ya, ~trixie~! I'm not really a "wizard", though. I use psychic powers called PSI! It's kinda like magic... but not!

...It ain't a contest, ya weirdo. A time-travelin', lardball dictator invaded my island home, mutilated animals to make them killin' machines, ripped families apart and tried to end the universe. Also, I'm an orphan.
...The hell's a "yankii," ~tomoko~? Some kinda stomach ulcer or something? There's nothin' magical about those, you know.
What kinda gibberish are you goin' on about, ~tomoko~? "Yankii" just sounds like some kind of skin rash. What's magical about that?
Heh, I'm glad you like my looks, but I'm not much of an artsy kinda gal, ~ignatz~. That's probably because my adopted parents were all about fashion.
Haha, thanks! I've always been a fan of pink 'n blue. I don't have much of an eye for art or looks outside of that, though. My adopted parents made me sick of it.
Polite and a good listener! Yeah, all eight of the Magypsies lived in giant, pink seashells. They've got really soft carpet indoors, and when it rains, it sounds awesome.
You've been payin' attention, I see! Yeah, each Magypsy lived in a giant seashell. They're really big on the inside, with soft carpet 'n stuff. When the wind howls, it plays beautiful music!
What, you think I'm gonna stop tryin' to get your clothes off since I've lost a round? Keep dreamin'.
If you think I'm gonna stop tryin' to get ya naked just 'cause I've lost a round, you're dreamin'.
I've been makin' good on that promise, haven't I? You're more naked-like than when we started!
You're a couple layers short of a complete outfit, ain't ya? I'd say I'm makin' good on my word.
I'm a prim-and-proper lady, Leon. I wanna get to know a guy before I take 'em home. What better way to do that than strippin' him down?
Awww, but what's the fun in that? I wanna make him squirm a little before takin' him home.
Awww, thanks, ~yuno~! I'm pretty lucky that it looks good on me, considerin' it's my natural color. Hair dye ain't my thing.
That's sweet of ya, ~yuno~! I'm glad it suits me, since I don't dye my hair. It's all natural, baby!
Whaddya mean, sorry? That's awesome! No one's ever drawn me before, except on those wanted posters. Can I see it?
You ain't bad company yourself, ~natsuki~! Gettin' naked with you ain't the worst thing in the world.
That almost sounded like a compliment, ~natsuki~! I'll take it. I'm glad one of the strangers I've met here is you, too.
You say that like panties aren't a pain in the ass! Literally!
I'm no comedian, ~natsuki~. Panties bein' a literal pain in the butt is just a fact.
Honestly, I wish they were smaller. They just get in the way. Feeling 'em bounce around all the time is exhausting.
Man, I wish I had a bra like that! I'm jealous of your chest size, ~natsuki~. You don't have to worry about 'em getting in the way.
I'm flattered that a scholarly gentlemen like yourself is so curious about me, but what's the fun in spoilin' the surprise?
Who knows...? A lady's gotta have a weapon to fall back on, y'know?
Awww! You look so dissapointed. I am tryin' to win, believe it or not.
Haha! Sorry to disappoint ya, ~leon~. I'm tryin' to win, after all.
...You know how to strike up a bargain, Mr. Kennedy. You've got experience with that silver tongue of yours...?
...Sounds like a deal to me, Mr. Kennedy. You must've had practice with that silver tongue of yours...
Pfffft! Haha! Oh, man! The idiots who named Club Titiboo knew exactly what they were doin'! It wasn't a strip joint, ~jessie~.
Snnnrk! Oh my god! It wasn't a strip club, ~jessie~, though they knew what they were doin' when they named it "Titiboo".
...You're not wrong, Hooter. It's the only thing that connects me to my real parents. Outside of the blood in my veins, at least.
...Yeah, you could say that. My biological parents gave it to me, before... who knows what happened to 'em.

You've got it, Angel Guy! Man, what a thrill that was!
...Er, sorry if I blasted ya with Starstorm, though.

Oh yeah! That tournament was awesome, Mr. Dead Angel Guy!
...Sorry if you got hit by PK Starstorm, though.
Nope. For one thing, I'm not actually a princess. That's just what people call me.
I have no idea what an "ehzpur" is, but bein' "royalty" has nothin' to do with PSI. I'm not a real princess, for starters.
Oh, nevermind! It turns out I learned the amazin' ability of being trash at poker. Yay.
I can't say the idea of gettin' naked bothers me all that much. I didn't have a standard upbringin', since I was raised by the Magypsies!
I don't get to meet too many folks with a wild hair color like mine, but this places has all kinds of weird colors! I like it!
This place has a good cleaning crew, right? Like, with people n' stuff? No magic brushrooms, I hope...
You'd think they'd give us a basket or somethin' to put our stuff in. I guess I'll just chuck my stuff on the ground, like a barbarian.
Oh no, the horror... or some crap like that. I don't get complainin' about havin' to strip. That's what we're here for, right?
You're right! Me not usin' PK Fire to burn some clothing is a waste. I think you'd look better nude, though. I'm sure you wouldn't mind if I burned your clothes off, right?
I wouldn't mind usin' my powers to burn off clothes. It won't be mine, though. I bet you would look much better in your birthday suit anyway.
Guess it's time I step outta the kiddie pool, huh? Too bad there's not any actual water here. I'm a big fan of makin' cannonballs!
...You know, it's kind of a missed opportunity that there's not a lake or whatever around here. Nothing beats skinny dippin'!
I'd suggest we go swimmin' somewhere after this, but there appears to be a distinct lack of water here. It's a shame, since you're all lookin' "dressed" for it.
I'm not playin' too shabby so far, huh? Maybe this'll be a breeze! Or, maybe it'll all go up in flames in a minute. Who knows?
Whoops. Gettin' cocky never works out, does it? This is why I'm always bein' called "hasty", I guess.
That's me. I guess I'll tell ya about myself. I'm the Princess of Osohe Castle, on the Nowhere Islands! Except, I don't live in the castle, and I'm not a princess.
I'm no stranger to danger, but I haven't even lost anythin' major! I'm willin' to wager I'll be celebratin' this victory in... uh... a manger? Damn, ran outta steam..
Heh! I guess that means it's time for me to join the strippin' party. Even "princesses" like cuttin' loose sometimes.
I really gotta hand it to you guys; I was startin' to think that loss earlier was just a fluke! Oh God, I'm turning into a pun-spewing grandpa, like Alec...
You know, these gloves ain't my best pair! I've got some that glow with all the colors of the rainbow! They're the Mystical Gloves, and they're damn powerful.
Well dang, there goes my winnin' streak. I'll be doin' the streakin' if I'm not careful. Not that it scares me.
Oof, that took the wind outta my sails. Guess I gotta row my boat by hand, now. Maybe I shoulda joined that weird-ass boat club these two jokers had back in Tazmily...
Aww, dammit. Nipped my streak in the bud, huh? Well, I hope you're into gloveless hands.
Heh! Knowin' Lady Luck's tendency to make ya start losing once you start spewin' boasts, I'm not gonna brag about it. Much.
I only lost this hand 'cause I felt sorry for you chumps- pffffft, ahaha! Couldn't finish that with a straight face! Naw, I lost 'cause my hand was putrid garbage.
...Dammit. Yeah, yeah, I know I'm winnin'. I just hate losin' this pendant. It's a gift the Magypsies gave me. Don't touch it.
Whoops. Losin' a winning streak feels so unsatisfyin', doesn't it? Like gettin' a 15 hit combo in sound battles, but cockin' the last hit up...
You know, for someone who comes from a place literally called "Nowhere Islands", I ain't doin' half bad! Beginner's luck, probably.
I'm still winnin' this game, ~player~, so I hope me removin' my necklace gets you all hot n' bothered.
Damn. Well, don't get too excited. I'm still on my trinket-removin' stage. This is where some of you guys get all huffy at me, right?
Well, now the gloves are off! Er, I mean, that happened a few rounds ago already, but I meant metaphorically! Aww, you get the idea.
I'm not gonna lie; this is actually startin' to get kinda embarrassin'. To keep bein' honest, though, it's gettin' more excitin', too.
I guess you really wanted to see more of me, huh? I'm flattered, really.
Heh! Things are startin' to get real for me, huh? I'm gettin' kinda excited.
I see you over there, ~player~, lookin' all pleased with yourself. You're happy I lost, huh?
Whoops. Damn, what a display, huh? I'm technically winnin', but it sure as hell doesn't feel like it when you're close to showin' the world your birthday suit.
....It'd be no fun if I never had to strip, I suppose. Then I'd just be standing here awkwardly as everyone gets naked.
Ack! I blame you for distractin' me, ~player~! Lookin' at me like that.... how the hell do you manage to have puppy-dog eyes and that stone cold face at the same time?!
This isn't really here or there, but... fryin' pans suck as weapons. I tried usin' one once, but it was just weak and made annoying sounds.
...Oof. Ach! Friggin'... yikes! Ya might even say "Mama mia!".
Who's the unlucky chump this time? Is it ~player~? ... It's me, ain't it?
I wonder if Duster would be any good at this strip poker business. That dude has a solid poker face that also looks vaguely bum-like. Hell, he even went by the name Lucky for a while!
Hey, I ain't in last, so that's a win to me! Worryin' and being all anxious is Lucas' job.
Ya know, this game is pretty fun! The Magypsies didn't play card games, and I didn't really hang out with the Tazmily villagers much, either, so this is pretty new to me.
I can't say there's much skill to this game, but it's pretty fun! I guess that's because I'm in good company.
Well, well... time to let the girls bounce free, huh? I wonder how many guys at Club Titiboo have thought about 'em...
The bra's comin' off, huh? Fine by me! I never liked wearin' these damn things anyways.
Well, I'd rather not be losin', but hey, at least I'll be comfortable. I'll basically be wearin' my pajamas!
Time to get naked, huh? Don't mind if I do...
Well dang, there goes my winnin' streak... Now I'm just doing regular streakin'.
Urk-! I got too cocky n' messed up my lead. That's an unsatisfying feelin'... especially since I'm right on the edge of losin'.
I'm in the "lead"... but it sure as hell doesn't feel like it when I'm standin' here naked...
Heh, I guess wearin' these girly panties under my spats was a good call. I'm lookin' forward to slippin' them off, though!
I ain't afraid of gettin' a scrape or two. Hell, this one time I was gonna cut my own leg off when it got caught in a trap. Luckily for me 'n my leg, my thief buddy Duster helped me out.
That's my loss, huh? Well, it's like I always say; you can't stop a time-travelin' evil butterball dictator if you ain't willing to take some hits.
I'm up! Maybe I should do somethin' wild to dazzle you guys! Somethin' crazy! ...Nah.
Yeah, I figured this would happen sooner or later. We don't have poker games back home on the Nowhere Islands, after all.
What?! How dare you? I am royalty! This is most unbecoming of me- pfffft, ahaha! I can't finish sayin' that with a straight face!
Whoops. . Slow n' steady ain't my style... but goin' gloveless ain't, either.
Let's not get too excited, now. Nothin' all that amazin' is being stripped offa me yet.
Looks like my gloves are on the choppin' block. No glove puns, got it?
That's me. I'll probably feel more naked without my trusty gloves than I would with my bra!
Time to get slightly less un-naked, I guess.
Leapin' arrow lizards! I kinda crapped the bed with that hand, huh? Time to get rid of my last dinky item now... but this thing means a lot to me.
I guess I should say somethin' about myself, huh? I'm from the Nowhere Islands. There's not a whole lot there besides Tazmily Village, and Osohe Castle.
No sweat off my back. Or any part of my body, really! I'm not just sayin' that to make myself feel better. Probably.
Awww... time to give up my pendant. I bet you didn't notice I was wearin' one, huh?
Me again? Alrighty. You guys should be happy that I don't doll myself up like the Magypsies do, 'cause the game would still be goin' a hundred years from now!
I'm not worried about a loss here n' there. I'm still leadin' the pack, like Lucas did during our travels. We always followed him around, in a single file. Kinda weird, now that I think about it.
What're you starin' at, ~player~? ... Oh! It's my turn. You're in luck: Somethin' big is comin' off now.
Awww, man. I guess I don't have the hang of this game yet, huh? I didn't have time to do fun stuff like this growin' up, after all.
Are you allowed to show up to this place naked? ...Naw, no one's that much of a degenerate, right?
'Kay, I know this is gonna sound weird, but if anyone sees a random doorknob layin' on the ground, let me know. Lucas is still lookin' for that thing...
Alright, I'm up to bat again... Lucas'd probably start gettin' all nervous here, even though that kid has fought off armies of Pig Masks, and saved the world. Guess that's just who he is.
Usually, throwin' your clothes on the floor after a long day feels relaxin'. Usually you're doin' that in privacy, though.
Aw, crap. I'm takin' some heavy damage. PK Lifeup doesn't give ya fresh clothes, either... hey, no one said I was a comedian!
Damn. I was hopin' you were the loser, ~player~. Don't keep me waitin' too long, okay? I'm already givin' you, and everyone else, a steamy show, after all.
Who's the lucky chump this round? ...It's me, ain't it? Damn. Laughed my spats right offa me!
I ain't winnin' , but I ain't losin' either. I wonder if that's how Porky feels, locked in the Absolutely Safe Capsule of his. Not that I feel sorry for the fat bastard.
Oh, nice! I get to take this off! Never liked wearin' these things, man.
I'm not stupid, but I've never had the patience for slowin' down and plannin' things out. It's kinda bitin' me, huh?
Can't say I've ever been topless in public... but what the hell? You only live once!
I've fought giant, killer robots, giant, killer statues, and giant, killer slugs. I can handle bein' topless.
Whelp! You're gettin' the world's first Osohe strip show, ~player~. You're pretty lucky.
Oh, well. It could always be worse. I could be covered in soot after my house burned down. That's only slightly worse, though.
Time to show the world my groomin' habits, I guess. Well, this strip poker joint, anyway... This place has so many weirdos in it, doesn't it?
It's true that I'm used to sharin' a hotspring with the guys in my group, but when you're sittin' in water, all this stuff down below is outta sight. Well, here goes..
Oh boy... I kinda screwed up, didn't I? I, uh... I hope you think it looks okay, ~player~. I'm hopin' ya like it more than that, actually.
Whoa... My heart's beatin' like crazy! That makes this even more excitin', though...
My friend Duster was raised by his wrinkly coot of a father, and man, he could be a real jerk to 'em. He called him "moron" more often than his actual name! That's not how you treat your kid!
I'm already fallin' behind? Geez, didn't expect this to be an uphill battle right outta the gate...
Yowza! Takin' hits right as battle starts always gets ya riled up. I've been in more fights than I can count, so I'm gettin' into this!
Losin' my clothes while losin' at cards isn't a big deal. I've had to fight an evil, time-travelin' lardball "king" and his army of pig-themed cronies, after all.
...If this poker play doesn't scream "royalty" to you, I don't know what will.
You look surprised that I lost, ~player~. Don't be! I'm used to gettin' myself into-and-back-out-of sticky situations like this! I've seen weird stuff, trust me.
Whelp! That didn't take long. The name's Kumatora, and I'm a PSI user! That means I can shoot fire n' stuff from my mind.
Another hit?! You moron! You're a failure and a disgrace! Heh. You like my Wess Impression? He knew better than to talk like that to me.
Aw crap, things are lookin' pretty grim. Trust me, I've seen grim! I used to travel around with a mopey kid like Lucas, ya know.
What the hell, man? I'm really playin' like crap. Nudity doesn't bother me, but flat-out suckin' at the game sure does!
...Heh... I kinda wish I talked to that save frog by the door over there, the one in the little tuxedo. Actually, I don't want 'em recording this game to memory, so never mind.
I wouldn't have been able to help save the world if I just gave up when things got a lil' dicey, you know?
...Damn, what's a girl gotta do to get good cards? I sure as hell ain't doin' that lame-ass dance Wess taught me. That only works on stone doors anyway.
I mean, hey, losin' here doesn't mean I die! Well, mostly. The only thing that dies when I lose are tiny bits of dignity.
I ain't doin' so well, but hey, I'm used to fightin' tooth n' nail with everything I've got! 'Course, my fights don't usually end in nudity.
...These ain't PSI-proof cards, right? Askin' for a friend.
Time to say goodbye to my spats, huh? I'd invite you guys to its funeral... but you're kinda the reason it's dead.
...Gee, I'm really startin' to stand out, aren't I? Maybe that's how Leder feels. Dude is like... 20 feet tall! He's pretty quiet, though.
I'm gettin' a real strong craving for some ice cream. Any good places for that kinda thing around here? ...This is probably why I'm losin', huh?
Gee, I hope I'm not blowin' you away with my poker skills. Keep your applause to yourselves.
Eh... it's still early. I'm not gonna whine 'n moan... Though, I will give a friendly reminder that I can set things on fire with my mind.
Argh...! I hate losin' my pendant, just in general... but I especially don't like losin' it by suckin' at the game!
It sucks enough that I'm losin'... Now I've got to give my most prized possession, too.
Man, I'm really playin' like Cattlesnake crap... At least you guys don't have to smell that. Yuck.
Urk! Again... this is the part where Lucas scolds me, saying how "reckless", "loud" and "hasty" I'm bein'.
Well, damn, guess this'll be my last line of defense. My HP's not zero, though, so I ain't givin' up just yet!
Damn, now I gotta say "sayonara" to my underwear too? Ya don't hafta look that excited, ~player~. Heh!
Ya done good, panties. I don't normally wear these with my spats, but I figured it'd be smart to this time.
You know, I never gave much thought to my "down there" hair before. I just get rid of it when it's too much.
You're lucky, ~player~... and everyone else. There were plenty of customers at Club Titiboo that would've loved seein' me all naked-like.
...Man, this hoodie has survived explosions, volcanoes, mecha gorillas... but it couldn't survive strip poker. Figures.
Whelp. I'm all outta itty-bitty, small, insignificant stallin' items now. Off goes my favorite-and-only hoodie!
Yikes. I'm suckin' more than those weird-ass trees near the Drago Plateau... What? Somethin' on my face, ~player~?
....Don't eat mushrooms, kids. Take it from me. Oh crap, I lost, didn't I? Nice knowin' ya, hoodie...
Time for the hoodie to face the music, huh? The lame, dumb, sucky kind of music.
I mean, hey, losin' here doesn't mean I die! Well, mostly. The only thing that dies when I lose are tiny bits of dignity.
I actually prefer bein' topless... Goin' topless because you're losin' feels different, though.
Yeah, yeah, keep kickin' me while I'm down...
What the hell, man? I'm really playin' like crap. Nudity doesn't bother me, but flat-out suckin' at the game sure does!
I used to be quick to anger as a kid, but I like to think I've mellowed out as time went on. That's why I'm only slightly annoyed.
Things ain't lookin' too good for me... but if my monkey pal, Salsa, could beat up a Cactus Wolf, the meanest bastard in the desert, I can handle this game.
There's nothin' wrong with flirtin'. It's somethin' that takes a lot of practice.
...I'm glad you 'n I are gonna get along, but I still don't know who you're talkin' about, Amy.
How about you, Amy? What does a glasses-wearin' cutie like you do for fun? Though, that look in your eye is tellin' me about one kinda activity you're interested in...

Pfft. Nat, you're a tough, fiery lady with backbone! The size of your personality with the size of your small-but-womanly body gives you a special charm! Amy, ~player~ 'n I have all been lookin' at ya.
Don't sweat it, Amy. My adopted parents, the Magypsies, said I had this on when they found me.
This pendant here is pretty much the only thing I have left of my real parents, Nat. They died when I was too young to remember them.
I'm likin' ya the more you talk, Amy! You're quite bold, ain't ya? That must've been excitin', hmm?
I'll admit that I thought about comin' here without a bra... I figured wearin' it would give me more time to get hot people like you naked, though.
It makes it impossible to get bored talkin' to her, don't you think, Nat? Yes, Amy. Sometimes I like to feel the breeze under my hoodie.
Lose-lose? Gettin' to see more of me ain't that bad--
...That almost sounds like a lame pickup line, kinda like the ones I heard all the time workin' as a waitress. "Your tits are tense, let me massage 'em".
No idea, Nat. I'm lookin' forward to it, though. Spill the beans, girl!
I'm all ears, girl. I'm also about to be all naked.
Somethin' you can do for me, huh...? Normally, I'd ask what the catch is, but... You seem like one of those sincere, trustworthy types.
Normally, an offer like that from somebody you just met would be fishy, but... You're way too sweet for it to be suspicious!
No, since I'm not an idiot. Does she make fun of everyone like this, ~player~?
...You're mockin' me. Real charming friend you've got here, ~player~.
That's kinda the point, Prez. You typically zap your enemies, not your friends or club-mates, or whatever.
...The Magypsies "awoke" my PSI ability, Meia. They're ancient, powerful masters of PSI, and they took me in as an orphaned baby. I use the powers they gave me to fight a gene-stealin' tyrant.
Well, you're right. My powers weren't passed down by blood, since they were given to me by the non-human Magypsies. They live for thousands of years, and gender doesn't really apply to them, either.

condition.saying: Can you confirm that you are a princess, Kumatora? It would make this picture feel more special.

case.state: I don't have an official "Fancy-ass Princess" stamp on me, if that's what you're askin'... Wait, who said you could take pictures?!

condition.saying: Maybe you really aren't a princess after all

case.state: What kinda stupid nonsense are you goin' on about? I'm not sellin' my underwear, ya weirdo!
...The hell's a "satellite", Meia? I guess we don't have 'em, if I've never heard that before. The Nowhere Islands keep to themselves.
I'd say we don't have those, since I have no clue what a "satellite" is. The Nowhere Islands is its own little world.
Well, where I'm from you have to have your PSI potential "activated" by a Magypsy, which are strangely-dressed, long-lived masters of PSI. After that, you just kinda... "know" how to use it.

Huh. That sounds like my pal Lucas. His PSI is great at supportin' the team, with shields, healing, and he can buff us, too! He does have one extremely powerful "spell", though. He calls it "Love", and it blows everything up!
...What? You don't just say somethin' heavy like that outta the blue 'n expect people to pretend it didn't happen, ya know.
...You're messin' with me, aren't you? Is this gonna be a theme tonight?
Maps? We do have one geezer named Mapson who likes to... uh, draw maps. We can map out the islands themselves, but we have no idea where anything else is.
This one geezer named Mapson likes to map out the Islands... but we have no idea what's outside of them. We keep to ourselves.
The Magypsies were ancient beings, each one tied to one of the seven Needles around Nowhere. They were PSI masters, "historians", 'n my adopted parents.
The Magypsies were powerful masters of PSI, 'n each one was bound to one of the seven Needles, scattered around Nowhere. They kept watch over the needles, 'n were my adopted parents.
Well, they're all gone, so you're outta luck. Besides, PSI ain't a walk in the park. Whenever you're about to learn a new technique, you get sick as hell with a fever 'n all that crap.
They're... gone, now. PSI has its downsides, anyways. Every time you learn a new move to use, you get real sick with a high fever.
Pfft, nope! I use PSI! It's way different! ...Okay, not really. It's similar to magic, but it all comes from the mind. Not everyone's got potential for it.
Yup! I guess I was handful, even back as a lil' squirt!
Heh, I've always liked that name. I wonder if they named me that for bein' a lil' troublemaker!
Heh! She's got a contagious laugh, doesn't she? You have good taste in friends, ~player~.
Haha! Hearin' her laugh is real treat, ain't it? You know how to pick your friends, ~player~.
Yeah... I don't have any memories of 'em, since I was given up as a baby. This lets me know they cared.
I was given up by my parents when I was a baby, so I don't have any memories of 'em. This pendant shows they're always with me.
Heh! I'm flattered you're lookin' there, Homegirl, but I'm not showin' off the goods quite yet.
Tryin' to get a peek already, Homegirl? Ha! I'm flattered, but I ain't given away the good stuff yet.
"Passionate", huh? Heh, I guess you're right. You know, I bet dancin' would be a lot of fun! I like being active, anyway!
"Confidence", huh? Ha, you've got me there. I never thought about it before, but dancin' might be somethin' I'd enjoy!
Yeah, something's tellin' me you guys probably aren't gonna be performin' at a place literally called "Nowhere". I'd love to visit Saga, though!
Pfft! My home is actually called "Nowhere", so I really doubt that's in your tour book! Saga sounds like a fun place to visit, if it has you guys!
I guess that depends on how you define "disaster". I mostly used my power for fightin' an evil army and its cyborgs. I haven't had to use my PSI like that in years, though.
PSI is powerful, 'n just like any other weapon, it's dangerous in the wrong hands. I used it to free my home from an army and its cyborgs. We won, and I haven't had to use my powers since.
Long-ass, boring-ass story, Saki. The short version is everybody back home had their memories altered, 'n in their "new" memories, everyone knew I was a princess.
Workin' as a waitress taught me the art of flirtin', ~leon~. Showin' the goods right away is how you ruin the tease.
Showin' you the pink stuff right away kinda kills the point of teasin', Leon. Bein' a waitress taught me how to do it right, you know.
Oh yeah, tons. Both the graveyard by Osohe Castle were crawlin' with those things. They aren't much of a threat, though zombie dogs are annoying.
More times than I can count! There were regular zombies 'n zombie dogs in the graveyard by Osohe castle. The dogs are more annoying to deal with.
Nothing, considerin' you can't form a complete sentence. Is something distractin' you?
I was just watchin' ya turn even pinker than normal! Something on your mind?
What's that supposed to mean? Sounds like your community spends too much time stickin' their nose in other people's business.
Sounds like your community needs to get their heads outta their butt 'n mind their own beeswax.
You should know all about surprise, ~natsuki~! You combine disarmin' cuteness with the sexiness of a mature woman! Play to your strengths, girl!
Well, think of it like how you catch people off guard with your cute looks. Drawin' people in, then showin' them how much of a hot lady you are is... uh, hot!
It is comfy as hell, but I don't wear it to sleep in, ~leon~. What do I wear when I sleep...? Figure that puzzle out, smart guy.
You've got a point there, ~leon~. Sometimes, you want step outta your comfort zone 'n be a little... wild.
If I'm bein' honest, I don't usually wear panties under these. It ain't comfortable. How's that for some Kumatora trivia?
These spats are comfy enough on their own. I don't usually wear panties under 'em. There's your Kumatora trivia of the day.
You sayin' you're not up to the challenge, ~leon~? Ladies like a man with confidence, ya know...
Heh. Too much to handle? I'm sure you'll find a way, somehow.
You know what? I think I'm with ya on that. If I had to choose between this pendant 'n my powers, I'd choose the pendant.
Hmmm... I think we're on the same page, Hooter. I'd choose my pendant over my powers any day.

condition.saying: I understand that, Kumatora. Practicality is quite important,

case.state: "Cute" ain't a word that's ever crossed my mind when it comes to my boots, but thanks! You know how to lay on the charm.
I dunno, lady. I don't have one lodged up there, and I'm not a real princess, right?
Oh, perish the thought, m'lady! I'd never dream of mockin' you or your uppity ways! Why, it just wouldn't be proper!
"Pyrokinesis", huh? I'm guessin' that's fire-related. Do you get to choose what kinda powers your "Vision" gives ya, or is it set in stone?
Yeah, it sounds like they ain't too different. Are your powers something you're born with, or do you get to choose?
Guess I'll start by takin' off my boots. These look heavy, but kickin' is more Duster's thing.
Fashion ain't my... uh, style. I like these boots, though. They're comfortable and durable!
Despite bein' raised by a group of super divas, I don't care about looks enough to doll myself up. My boots are gettin' tossed first.
If ya couldn't tell, pink is my favorite color. Anyone who wants to mouth off about it lookin' girly will find these planted firmly up their ass, alright?
According to Duster, I'm what most folks call a "tomboy". I've just never cared about fashion n' all that crap. These boots are the only footwear I own, actually.
These boots are the only footwear I have. They're tough 'n reliable, so why would I need anything else? Fancy-schmancy ain't my thing.
Guess I gotta kiss this lil' pendant goodbye for now. I'm not one for fancy jewelry, but this pendant means a lot to me.
My Mom and Dad died when I was a lil' baby, and the Magypsies took me in, and did their best to raise me. This pendant here is a gift they gave me. That means nobody touches it, got it?
See this pendant, ~player~? This was given to me by the Magypsies. It's the only keepsake I have of them. I can trust you to not swipe it, yeah?
My Mom and Pop gave me this lil' pendant sometime before they died. Lucas also had a badge given to him by his parents, too. I bet most families have little keepsakes like these.

My adoptive parents, the Magypsies, are all a buncha divas, and are always dollin' themselves up with makeup n' crap like that. That just ain't me. This hoodie is the only outfit I really have.
I know I have pink hair, and have pink boots, but to tell ya the truth, ~player~, this hoodie bein' blue just feels right.
I guess you guys have earned this... but you're gonna have to try harder to see the rest!
Damn, I'm really startin' to run outta options here. Guess it's time to chuck these spats off to the side.

When I was younger, I used to run around with just my underoos on under my hoodie, but Ionia kept tellin' me it wasn't "modest", so I started wearin' these. I'm glad I did, 'cause it gave me an extra layer to use.
Ya know, these shorts are pretty damn comfy! The fabric they're made of is kinda stretchy, so I've been able to wear 'em even after some growth spurts! I kinda like how they show off my hips, too.
"Spats" is kinda a weird name for these shorts, ain't it? It makes me think of a spitoon, kinda like the one Duster stole from Osohe Castle, except that spitoon was all shiny n' crap.

'Guess I'm goin' topless now! I'm used to throwin' this thing off when I get some alone time anyway. It's just so damn restrictive!
While my boobs ain't huge, they're still bigger than I'd like. When they were smaller, I didn't have to wear one of these stupid bras.
You won't see me complain about throwin' this bra off. Never liked how damn hot they are. Don't even get me started on how irritatin' it feels to get crumbs in 'em too!

I never liked how hot these things can make ya feel, so I'm kinda glad to chuck it off! You don't seem to mind either, ~player~. Bein' subtle ain't your strong suit, is it?
Maybe I should be more worried that I'm gettin' close to losin', but honestly, screw bras! They're just a pain in the butt. Not wearin' 'em is one of things I miss most about bein' a kid.
Heh... I hate to break it to you, ~player~, but I wore these girly-ass panties just to stay in the game a little longer! I normally go without 'em!

Well, crap. The air's so heavy with romance that I gotta drop my drawers. How lovely.
Whelp! These prissy panties helped keep me in the game a little longer, so good thinkin', me!
Joke's on you guys! I would've been outta the game by now if I went commando, like I normally do!
Time to show you guys how we do nudity in Osohe Castle! ...We, uh, get naked. Like this.

Sorry for what, Nat? If we're gettin' naked, we might as well do some flirtin' too. Amy seems fun, 'n you do too.
Yeah, I was kinda gettin' that impression, Amy. Explorin' that side of life is why I'm here, you know? You've got my attention, so hopefully I can keep yours.
Uh... Yeah, actually, I can imagine it. I can imagine you 'n ~player~, you 'n Amy, and you 'n me! Any and all combinations would be a fun time.

I haven't had two pretty ladies complimentin' me like this before! You two are great catches, too!

Wait a minute... I just now realized how freakin' weird it is that I got mystic gloves from some random monkey-thing.

Next time I'm in this place, I'll make sure to stop by the mole cricket's store 'n buy myself some extra doodads to use. Mole crickets usually give great prices, you know!
